org.epics.ca.client
Interface ClientContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientContextImpl
public interface ClientContext

The class representing a CA Client Context.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Matej Sekoranja

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Clear all resources attached to this Context

          Dispose (destroy) server context.

          Get channel provider implementation.

          Get context implementation version.

getVersion

Version getVersion()
Get context implementation version.

Returns:
version of the context implementation.

initialize

void initialize()
                throws CAException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException
Initialize client context. This method is called immediately after instance construction (call of constructor).

CAException
java.lang.IllegalStateException

out - the output stream.

destroy

void destroy()
             throws CAException,
                    java.lang.IllegalStateException
Clear all resources attached to this Context

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the context has been destroyed.
CAException

dispose

void dispose()
Dispose (destroy) server context. This calls destroy() and silently handles all exceptions.
